frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-ubuntu-appearance-gnome
frozen.shortDescription: Adds a toggle between the default Ubuntu themes on GNOME 40. Forked from https://github.com/Muqtxdir/yaru-remix-theme-toggle.
frozen.longDescription:
Adds a toggle between the default Ubuntu themes on GNOME 40. Forked from https://github.com/Muqtxdir/yaru-remix-theme-toggle.

It requires the `gnome-shell-extension-prefs` package installed on your Linux environment.
